game.name: Running Beehind
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Free To Play
game.shortDescription: Run fast, take risky shortcuts, and deliver food across Waspington or choose to rebel against your Hive; after all, nothing says job security like a perfectly timed landing.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Run fast, take risky shortcuts, and deliver food across Waspington or choose to rebel against your Hive; after all, nothing says job security like a perfectly timed landing.
